data.text: @AndrewHayen I was going to scoffer at your acronyms until that correction

@AndrewHayen Use analogies when evidence runs out
Have no concept of inevitable eventual infection
Believe humanity will co-ordinate to do things to eliminate a mild infection,that they haven't done to end hunger
Block detractors on Facebook
Talk about infection and stop - any consequences?
@AndrewHayen How can you screen someone for being a "private denier" of something if they are private about it ?  🤷‍♂️

@AndrewHayen Don't forget:
- Still arguing for "quarantine facilities" to protect against new variants
- Totally oblivious to the impact of closed borders on people trapped overseas or with compassionate needs
- Believe HC mask settings can be replicated population-wide with 100% compliance

@AndrewHayen I love how they still throw long Covid in there. Everytime more data comes in, the %s drop (1-2%) and the symptoms get milder. The latest NHS data suggests the only notable symptom is taste/smell and that’s much more a pre Omicron symptom. Everything else was at control.
@AndrewHayen And current president of the Australian Society of Anethsetists

@AndrewHayen ‘Pandemic is done vibes’?

Hell yeah baby! Awouuuuu! (Wolf howl).
